info.headline: High Wind Warning issued October 20 at 5:56AM MDT until October 20 at 11:00AM MDT by NWS Denver CO
info.description:
* WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, northwest winds 25 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph.
For the Freeze Warning, freezing or near freezing low temperatures between 29 and 32 degrees.
* WHERE...Fort Collins.
* WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, until 11 AM MDT this morning. For the Freeze Warning, from midnight tonight to 8 AM MDT Tuesday.
* IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and a few power outages may result. Blowing dust will reduce visibility to less than a mile in places. Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction:
Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.
Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold, either moving them indoors or covering with blankets.
To prevent water pipes from freezing, wrap or drain any above ground sprinkler systems.

parameter.value: HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MDT THIS MORNING... ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 8 AM MDT TUESDAY

area.areaDesc: Larimer County Below 6000 Feet/Northwest Weld County
